title: IDimPatternFeatureData.SetInstanceSuppressStateByName
description: Sets whether a pattern instance with the specified name is suppressed in this variable pattern feature.
signature:
System.String SetInstanceSuppressStateByName( 
   System.String
InstanceName
,
   System.Boolean
SuppressState
)

parameters.name: InstanceName
parameters.description: Name of pattern instance to suppress (see Remarks )

parameters.name: SuppressState
parameters.description: True if the pattern instance is suppressed, false if not

returns: If the pattern instance is... Then Return Value is an... Suppressed Empty string indicating success Not suppressed Error string
